title: Color Converter
description: Create a program that converts color from RGB to HEX or vice versa. If the user chooses to convert from RGB to HEX, use the formula HEX = '#%02x%02x%02x' % (R, G, B). If the user chooses to convert from HEX to RGB, use the formula R, G, B = int(HEX[1:3], 16), int(HEX[3:5], 16), int(HEX[5:7], 16).
